name: Freddy's Chaotic Bathtub
description:
Help Freddy to catch all his bath toys out of his bathtub.

The game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.


Controls:

Movement: W/S Up/Down

Space: Fishing (hold)

Score:
  • MULTIPLICATOR by collection multiple bath toys at once!
  • DISTANCE BONUS by collection bath toys far away!
  • COMBO by collection bath toys in a row (reset when there is no catch)
  • Duck: +100
  • Ship: +75
  • Fish: +50
  • Mine: -250
